info.name: SupraForums Streamlined
info.description:
SupraForums went to a new platform on June 13th, 2019.  This resulted in a significantly different style, which a lot of users don't like.  This Stylish style makes better use of a desktop browser's screen and removes a lot of superfluous stuff that seasoned users don't want to see.

Created by SupraForums user "bitshftr".
info.additionalInfo:
June 18th, 2019
- Made the SupraForums logo "great again" (white instead of red).
- Highlight the profile avatar (at top right) when Alerts exist.
- In thread listings, separate the forum/subforum name from the start date, and right-align it.

June 19th
- Change the background of sticky threads (only works when viewing a forum listing, not in search results).
- Change the profile "badge" to be more obvious by surrounding the "account details" avatar with a red mask that throbs.
- Make thread rows in thread listings shorter to show more on each screen without scrolling vertically.

July 12th
- Show unread conversations in blue.

July 19th
- Reduce the vertical space between subtabs on thread results screens (like "Following" or "Popular") and the page numbers.
- Left align avatars.

August 23rd
- Move the reply/like/share/report buttons over to the right side, next to the Bookmark button.

September 3rd
- Align the new advanced search (https://www.supraforums.com/search) better.

October 2nd
- Remove the stupid "necklace" around premium avatars.
- Move the "premium" avatar badge off to the side of the avatar.
- Move online green avatar dot off to the side of the avatar.

December 29th, 2019
- Adjustments to the position of the "premium" avatar badge (right side of the avatar).
- Adjustments to the online green username dot.

January 22, 2020
- The sticky threads background counter had to be changed because they added 15 rows to each thread listing.

January 10, 2021
- Multiple updates to reduce the wasted vertical and horizontal space introduced with the forum's new "Card" layout.

January 12, 2021
- Tweaks to alignment in the Conversations page.
- Allowance for long thread titles to wrap to a second line (without obscuring the avatar).
